original_title: วันแห่งฝันคืนแห่งแสง
overview: Northern Thailand forty years ago. People are living in the high valley far from the center of the country. The coming of electric power is the beginning of new stories for the people who live there.  Phakphum returns to his small village and recalls the day that changed his life forever. The day he met Kanya, a country girl who takes him on an unforgettable journey.
title: A Town Where We Live
